component.heading: You are going to buy shares worth
component.description: Ensure that your account has sufficient available limit to make this transaction

item.value: We will purchase all the stocks in the immediately, at the best available market price from either NSE or BSE. Note: the final purchase price might vary marginally

item.description: New to investing? Ensure your balance is enough to fund your investments

"Experienced investor? Avail our credit facility to place your order despite lower account balance. You can fund the investment within 2 days.
Note: Interest and other charges are applicable after 2 days"
